Plug in This Device In Your Home And See How It Keeps Rodents & Pests Out!

Updated: September 1

Wouldn’t it be nice if you never had to set another mouse trap in your house? Thanks to this brand new device, millions of Americans never have to worry about seeing another rodent in their house again..

Every home in the United States has had a pest problem. We all want them to go away, whether it’s creepy crawlers creeping around, an ant infestation, or rodents getting into our storage room.

So far we’ve tried several ways of getting rid of these pests with no luck. Most of us will get chills from grabbing a tissue and squishing that icky bug. Spraying a bottle of Raid all over the home is hazardous to our health. And if you love animals, you might not want to set a trap to harm that poor little mouse.

Fortunately, there is a revolutionary new method of dealing with these pests, both insects and rodents, that does not involve killing them and is completely safe for your health.

What Is It?

It’s called Pest Defence, and it’s swiftly becoming a must-have household item for every American.

The company behind Pest Defence was formed in 2019 by a group of experienced engineers from the EV (Electric vehicle) industry.

Their goal was to design an effective device to help homeowners keep annoying pests and critters away from their homes.

With no installation costs, no maintenance costs and it being more effective than the alternatives, The Pest Defence is an engineering masterpiece.

When compared to other pest repellents on the market, it is 300 percent more efficient, useful, inconspicuous, and cost effective—and it immediately begins working to keep pests out of your home!

People all over the US are using it to live ‘pest free’ — the results are incredible…

How Does It Work?

This discreet device uses state-of-the-art bionic, electromagnetic, and ultrasonic wave technology that humans and pets cannot hear to create an uncomfortable, but non-lethal environment for rodents, cockroaches, mosquitoes, ants, and other common unwanted insect and animal visitors. This means they’ll keep their distance, and you won’t be left with any unnecessary clean up.

Simply plug the the Pest Defence unit into any outlet and in no time at all your home will be completely free of unwanted household pests. The process to completely remove all pests in your home takes about 3 weeks. See below a timeline on how the Pest Defence works-

Some Questions People Ask

Q: Does The Pest Defence require any installation?

No, it works directly out of the box and is really simple to use. You will have it kicking out your unwanted guests immediately.

Q: Does The Pest Defence use toxins or chemicals?

No, it does not use any chemicals or toxins.

Q: Do you need a separate device for every room in the house?

Yes, the wave technology cannot penetrate through the walls.

Now, before you decide to try this new technology, it is important to note that it has a short-range. Usually they can work in one room but won’t cover a complete house. The device’s frequency gets weaker as it spreads further. Therefore, depending on the areas where pests may be present, you may need several units for multiple areas in your house.
